metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0488 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
ARM mbed TLS before 1.3.22, before 2.1.10, and before 2.7.0, when the truncated HMAC extension and CBC are used, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap corruption) via a crafted application packet within a TLS or DTLS session.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto1 - 2.7.0-2
libmbedtls10 - 2.7.0-2
libmbedx509-0 - 2.7.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-2').
